original: bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Blessed One of Great Compassion!

original: rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings las ma g-yos kyang //
analyzed: rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings las ma g-yos kyang //
translated: Without wavering from the natural dharmadhƒÅtu,

original: thugs rje chen pos gdul bya'i snang ngo la //
analyzed: thugs rje chen pos gdul bya'i snang ngo la //
translated: Through great compassion, in the perception of those to be tamed,

original: gang la gang 'dul de la de ston pa'i //
analyzed: gang la gang 'dul de la de ston pa'i //
translated: You display whatever is necessary to tame whomever,

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug khyed la bstod par bgyi //
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug khyed la bstod par bgyi //
translated: To Loke≈õvara, I offer praise.

original: 'khor bar gnas kyang skyon gyis ma gos phyir //
analyzed: 'khor bar gnas kyang skyon gyis ma gos phyir //
translated: Though dwelling in sa·πÉsƒÅra, unstained by faults,

original: padma dkar po rab rgyas lte ba la //
analyzed: padma dkar po rab rgyas lte ba la //
translated: In the center of a fully blossomed white lotus,

original: thugs rje'i chu rgyun 'bebs mdzad zla ba'i gdan //
analyzed: thugs rje'i chu rgyun 'bebs mdzad zla ba'i gdan //
translated: You sit on a moon seat, pouring down a stream of compassion,

original: ye shes 'gying tshul bzhugs mdzad khyod la bstod //
analyzed: ye shes 'gying tshul bzhugs mdzad khyod la bstod //
translated: With the bearing of wisdom, to you I offer praise.

original: 'jig rten log rtog ston pa 'dul ba'i phyir //
analyzed: 'jig rten log rtog ston pa 'dul ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to tame those who teach the wrong views of the world,

original: rgyal po'i rol stabs dbang phyug cha lugs 'dzin //
analyzed: rgyal po'i rol stabs dbang phyug cha lugs 'dzin //
translated: The king's dance, you hold the form of Mahesvara,

original: sna tshogs thabs mnga' rin chen rgyan gyis spras //
analyzed: sna tshogs thabs mnga' rin chen rgyan gyis spras //
translated: You are endowed with various means, adorned with precious ornaments,

original: 'jig rten kun gyis bstod pa khyod la 'dud //
analyzed: 'jig rten kun gyis bstod pa khyod la 'dud //
translated: You are praised by all the worlds, I bow to you.

original: don dam chos sku nyag gcig zhal mnga' zhing //
analyzed: don dam chos sku nyag gcig zhal mnga' zhing //
translated: You have the face of the ultimate, the sole dharmakaya,

original: thugs rjes 'gro la chags pas hr'i: las 'khrungs //
analyzed: thugs rjes 'gro la chags pas hr'i: las 'khrungs //
translated: Born from hri: through compassion, you are attached to beings,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur 'od dpag med //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur 'od dpag med //
translated: You are empowered by all the buddhas, you are Amitabha,

original: ral pa'i khur na 'chang ba khyod la bstod //
analyzed: ral pa'i khur na 'chang ba khyod la bstod //
translated: I praise you, who wears a topknot.

original: 'gro drug sgrol phyir ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin //
analyzed: 'gro drug sgrol phyir ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin //
translated: In order to liberate the six beings, you wear a topknot crown,

original: rgyal ba'i rgyal po rin chen dbu rgyan can //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i rgyal po rin chen dbu rgyan can //
translated: You are the king of victors, wearing a precious crown,

original: me tog cod pan rgyal sras 'gran zla bral //
analyzed: me tog cod pan rgyal sras 'gran zla bral //
translated: You are the prince with a flower crown, unrivaled by others,

original: dus @87b gsum rgyal ba'i bdag po khyod la bstod //
analyzed: dus @87b gsum rgyal ba'i bdag po khyod la bstod //
translated: I praise you, lord of the victors of the three times.

original: nor bu'i snyan chas 'gro la chos sgra sgrogs //
analyzed: nor bu'i snyan chas 'gro la chos sgra sgrogs //
translated: With the jewel earrings, you proclaim the dharma sound to beings,

original: spyan gsum dus gsum shes dang shes bya mkhyen //
analyzed: spyan gsum dus gsum shes dang shes bya mkhyen //
translated: With three eyes, you know the three times and all that is to be known,

original: 'dzum pa'i zhal mda' 'gro ba'i don la dgyes //
analyzed: 'dzum pa'i zhal mda' 'gro ba'i don la dgyes //
translated: With a smiling face, you delight in the welfare of beings.

original: stong nyid thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: stong nyid thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise you, who are emptiness endowed with compassion.

original: kun rdzob tsam du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi //
analyzed: kun rdzob tsam du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi //
translated: For the sake of sentient beings, you have taken on the form of a bodhisattva,üîΩAnd for the sake of sentient beings, you have taken on the form of a monk.

original: nyon mongs kun skyob bde ba'i mchog sbyin cing //
analyzed: nyon mongs kun skyob bde ba'i mchog sbyin cing //
translated: I pay homage and praise you, who are the supreme bliss that protects from all the afflictions of samsaric suffering.

original: don dam rnam dag padma dkar po bsnams //
analyzed: don dam rnam dag padma dkar po bsnams //
translated: You hold a pure white lotus of ultimate truth,

original: thabs shes zung 'jug phyag gnyis phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: thabs shes zung 'jug phyag gnyis phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: And you are endowed with the union of method and wisdom. I pay homage and praise you, who have two arms.

original: sred pa'i mes gdungs rgyud lnga'i sems can la //
analyzed: sred pa'i mes gdungs rgyud lnga'i sems can la //
translated: You pour down a stream of nectar for the five classes of sentient beings, who are tormented by the fire of craving.

original: bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bebs g-yas na spyi blugs 'dzin //
analyzed: bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bebs g-yas na spyi blugs 'dzin //
translated: You hold a water pot in your right hand,

original: bdud bzhi'i 'jigs skyob g-yon pa skyabs sbyin mdzad //
analyzed: bdud bzhi'i 'jigs skyob g-yon pa skyabs sbyin mdzad //
translated: And you grant protection with your left hand, protecting from the fear of the four maras.

original: 'khor 'das gnyis med gzigs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: 'khor 'das gnyis med gzigs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise you, who see the non-duality of samsara and nirvana.

original: srid gsum gzod nas dben par rtogs pa'i phyir //
analyzed: srid gsum gzod nas dben par rtogs pa'i phyir //
translated: Because you realize the primordial emptiness of the three realms,

original: ri dgas lpags pas sku yi sham thabs mdzad //
analyzed: ri dgas lpags pas sku yi sham thabs mdzad //
translated: You wear the skin of an antelope as your lower garment.

original: 'khor 'das rang bzhin spros bral rtogs pa'i phyir //
analyzed: 'khor 'das rang bzhin spros bral rtogs pa'i phyir //
translated: Because you realize the nature of samsara and nirvana to be free from elaborations,

original: gangs ri kunda'i mdangs ldan khyod la bstod //
analyzed: gangs ri kunda'i mdangs ldan khyod la bstod //
translated: I praise you, who are as radiant as a snow mountain and a kunda flower.

original: khyod kyi thugs rje'i rgyun gyis dus gsum gyi //
analyzed: khyod kyi thugs rje'i rgyun gyis dus gsum gyi //
translated: Through the stream of your compassion, you pervade the three times,

original: rgyal ba sras bcas 'gro don la bskul nas //
analyzed: rgyal ba sras bcas 'gro don la bskul nas //
translated: You have inspired the Victorious Ones and their heirs to benefit beings,

original: mdzad bya'i phrin las ma lus mdzad pa'i phyir //
analyzed: mdzad bya'i phrin las ma lus mdzad pa'i phyir //
translated: And so that all the activities to be performed may be accomplished,

original: dkyil 'khor gtso bor bzhugs pa khyod la bstod //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gtso bor bzhugs pa khyod la bstod //
translated: I praise you, the principal one who resides in the mandala.

original: pha rol phyin bcu'i yon tan rab rdzogs phyir //
analyzed: pha rol phyin bcu'i yon tan rab rdzogs phyir //
translated: Because you have perfected the qualities of the ten perfections,

original: phyag zhabs kun la nor bu'i rgyan gyis spras //
analyzed: phyag zhabs kun la nor bu'i rgyan gyis spras //
translated: Your hands and feet are adorned with jeweled ornaments,

original: sa bcu'i stobs rdzogs ye shes mnga' ba'i phyir //
analyzed: sa bcu'i stobs rdzogs ye shes mnga' ba'i phyir //
translated: And because you possess the wisdom of perfecting the ten powers,

original: mu tig do shal 'phyang la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: mu tig do shal 'phyang la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise you, the one who wears a pearl necklace.üîΩBecause you guide beings with the power of miraculous abilities

original: rdzu 'phrul mthu yis 'gro ba drang ba dang // stobs bcu'i rtsal gyis bdud dpung gzhom pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul mthu yis 'gro ba drang ba dang // stobs bcu'i rtsal gyis bdud dpung gzhom pa'i phyir //
translated: And conquer the demon hordes with the strength of the ten powers,

original: zhabs gnyis cung zad brkyang bskum rol pas bzhugs //
analyzed: zhabs gnyis cung zad brkyang bskum rol pas bzhugs //
translated: You sit in the posture of royal poise, with one leg extended and one slightly bent.

original: rtag par gzhan don mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: rtag par gzhan don mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise you, the one who always acts for the benefit of others.

original: srid pa gsum po dbyings su bsgral ba'i phyir //üîΩ'dzam bu chu bo'i gser ltar 'bar ba'i skus //
analyzed: srid pa gsum po dbyings su bsgral ba'i phyir // 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser ltar 'bar ba'i skus //
translated: In order to liberate the three realms into basic space,üîΩYour blazing body is like the gold of the Jambu River,

original: ye shes ral pa'i 'od zer 'gyed mdzad pa'i //
analyzed: ye shes ral pa'i 'od zer 'gyed mdzad pa'i //
translated: Radiating light rays from the hair between your eyebrows.

original: ma rig mun pa 'joms la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: ma rig mun pa 'joms la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: Homage and praise to you who destroy the darkness of ignorance.

original: gzung 'dzin dri ma dang bral padma'i gdan //
analyzed: gzung 'dzin dri ma dang bral padma'i gdan //
translated: Seated on a lotus seat free from the stains of subject and object,

original: nyon mongs gdung sel zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs //
analyzed: nyon mongs gdung sel zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs //
translated: Seated on a moon seat that dispels the torment of afflictions,

original: 'gro don yengs pa mi mnga'a bzhengs tshul can //
analyzed: 'gro don yengs pa mi mnga'a bzhengs tshul can //
translated: With a posture that is never distracted from benefiting beings,

original: thugs rje chags pa'i mdog mnga'a khyod la 'dud //
analyzed: thugs rje chags pa'i mdog mnga'a khyod la 'dud //
translated: I bow to you who possess the color of compassionate attachment.

original: thabs kyi zhags pas 'gro ba drang ba'i phyir //
analyzed: thabs kyi zhags pas 'gro ba drang ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to guide beings with the noose of skillful means,

original: ha las 'khrungs @88a * //
analyzed: ha las 'khrungs @88a * //
translated: You manifest from the syllable ha,

original: pa'i tshul ston don chen mdzad //
analyzed: pa'i tshul ston don chen mdzad //
translated: Displaying the way of birth, performing great meaning.

original: skye med zhal mnga'a srid gsum gzigs pa'i spyan //
analyzed: skye med zhal mnga'a srid gsum gzigs pa'i spyan //
translated: Having a face of non-arising, eyes that see the three existences,

original: dbu rgyan rgyal ba'i cod pan 'chang la bstod //
analyzed: dbu rgyan rgyal ba'i cod pan 'chang la bstod //
translated: I praise you who wear the crown of the victorious ones.

original: bden bzhi'i phyag gis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor //
analyzed: bden bzhi'i phyag gis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor //
translated: With the four noble truths, you turn the wheel of Dharma,

original: snying rje'i zhags pas 'gro ba 'dren par mdzad //
analyzed: snying rje'i zhags pas 'gro ba 'dren par mdzad //
translated: With the noose of compassion, you guide beings,

original: rtogs pa'i rdo rjes log rtog mtshan ma 'joms //
analyzed: rtogs pa'i rdo rjes log rtog mtshan ma 'joms //
translated: With the vajra of realization, you conquer the signs of wrong views.

original: sgyu ma'i rdzu 'phrul mnga'a ba khyod la bstod //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i rdzu 'phrul mnga'a ba khyod la bstod //
translated: I praise you who possess illusory miraculous powers.

original: mkhyen brtse'i lcags kyus 'khor ba bde bar 'gugs //
analyzed: mkhyen brtse'i lcags kyus 'khor ba bde bar 'gugs //
translated: With the hook of knowledge and love, you happily lead beings from samsara,

original: nus ldan bgrang phreng yon tan gter mdzod 'dzin //
analyzed: nus ldan bgrang phreng yon tan gter mdzod 'dzin //
translated: You hold the rosary of power, a treasure-house of good qualities.

original: 'gro don mdzod mkhas zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum tshul //
analyzed: 'gro don mdzod mkhas zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum tshul //
translated: You are skilled in the treasury of benefit for beings, your two feet extended and contracted.

original: mtshan don ldan par bzhugs pa khyod la bstod //
analyzed: mtshan don ldan par bzhugs pa khyod la bstod //
translated: You are seated with meaningful attributes‚Äîto you I offer praise.

original: ma chags padma'i rigs te skyon bral steng //
analyzed: ma chags padma'i rigs te skyon bral steng //
translated: You are the lotus family of non-attachment, seated on a stainless lotus.

original: mkhyen pas nyin mongs tshogs 'joms nyi ma'i gdan //
analyzed: mkhyen pas nyin mongs tshogs 'joms nyi ma'i gdan //
translated: With knowledge, you destroy the host of afflictions, seated on a sun seat.

original: bdud dpung mdzoms mdzad khro rgyal h'um las 'khrungs //
analyzed: bdud dpung mdzoms mdzad khro rgyal h'um las 'khrungs //
translated: You crush the armies of demons, born from the wrathful king H≈´·πÉ.

original: khro bas khro ba 'dul mdzad khyod la bstod //
analyzed: khro bas khro ba 'dul mdzad khyod la bstod //
translated: You tame the wrathful with wrath‚Äîto you I offer praise.

original: rngam pa'i zhul gyis log rtogs dbyings su gsol //
analyzed: rngam pa'i zhul gyis log rtogs dbyings su gsol //
translated: With your terrifying fangs, you consume false conceptions in basic space.

original: dmar sel ral pas log 'dren bran du 'dul //
analyzed: dmar sel ral pas log 'dren bran du 'dul //
translated: With your red-tipped claws, you tame false guides as servants.

original: ye shes spyan gyis khams gsum sku gsum gzigs //
analyzed: ye shes spyan gyis khams gsum sku gsum gzigs //
translated: With your wisdom eyes, you see the three realms as the three kƒÅyas.

original: rta mgrin rta skad sgrogs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: rta mgrin rta skad sgrogs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: To Hayagrƒ´va, who neighs like a horse, I offer homage and praise.üîΩWith your vajra club, you pulverize the hordes of obstructors;

original: rdo rje dbyug pas bgegs dpung rdul du rlog / rdo rje sdigs mdzub bdud sde skrag par mdzad //
analyzed: rdo rje dbyug pas bgegs dpung rdul du rlog / rdo rje sdigs mdzub bdud sde skrag par mdzad //
translated: with your vajra threatening gesture, you terrify the hordes of demons.

original: gser gyi 'khor los 'khor ba'i rtsab gcod //
analyzed: gser gyi 'khor los 'khor ba'i rtsab gcod //
translated: With your golden wheel, you sever the root of sa·πÉsƒÅra.

original: chags bral padma 'chang la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: chags bral padma 'chang la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise Padmanarte≈õvara, who is free from attachment.

original: rin chen sprul rgyan klu rgyal gdug pa 'dul //
analyzed: rin chen sprul rgyan klu rgyal gdug pa 'dul //
translated: You tame the poisonous nƒÅga kings with jeweled nƒÅga ornaments,

original: glang chen g-yang gzhi stobs bcu mnga'a ba'i dpal //
analyzed: glang chen g-yang gzhi stobs bcu mnga'a ba'i dpal //
translated: And with the elephant hide, you possess the glory of the ten powers.

original: stag sham pa tis phrin las rnam bzhi mdzad //
analyzed: stag sham pa tis phrin las rnam bzhi mdzad //
translated: With the tiger skin and pata, you perform the four actions.

original: khro rgyal brkyang bskum bzhugs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: khro rgyal brkyang bskum bzhugs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise the wrathful king, standing with one leg extended and one leg drawn in.

original: skyon bral gdan la rmongs sel nyi ma'i steng //
analyzed: skyon bral gdan la rmongs sel nyi ma'i steng //
translated: On a seat free from faults, on top of the sun that dispels ignorance,

original: pha las 'khrungs pa'i bdud 'dul nag mo che //
analyzed: pha las 'khrungs pa'i bdud 'dul nag mo che //
translated: The great black one who subdues demons born from the father,

original: rngam pa'i stabs kyis gdug pa sgrol bar mdzad //
analyzed: rngam pa'i stabs kyis gdug pa sgrol bar mdzad //
translated: With a terrifying gait, you liberate the vicious.

original: mche ba gtsigs pas bdud bzhi gsol la bstod //
analyzed: mche ba gtsigs pas bdud bzhi gsol la bstod //
translated: I praise you, who with bared fangs consume the four demons.

original: rnam thar phyag brgyad ye shes rno ba'i mtshon //
analyzed: rnam thar phyag brgyad ye shes rno ba'i mtshon //
translated: Your eight liberated arms are weapons of sharp wisdom,

original: shes rab ral gris gti mug rtsad nas gcod //
analyzed: shes rab ral gris gti mug rtsad nas gcod //
translated: With the sword of praj√±ƒÅ, you cut ignorance from the root.

original: thugs rje'i zhags bskyon bral padma 'chang //
analyzed: thugs rje'i zhags bskyon bral padma 'chang //
translated: You hold a lasso of compassion, and you hold a lotus.

original: thabs mkhas brtse ba'i mda' 'phen khyod phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: thabs mkhas brtse ba'i mda' 'phen khyod phyag 'tshal //
translated: I pay homage to you, who shoot the arrow of skillful means and love.

original: 'khor los srid pa'i 'khor lo 'joms mdzad cing //
analyzed: 'khor los srid pa'i 'khor lo 'joms mdzad cing //
translated: With the wheel, you conquer the wheel of existence,

original: dbyug pas bgegs 'dul rtse gsum dug gsum gcod //
analyzed: dbyug pas bgegs 'dul rtse gsum dug gsum gcod //
translated: The club subdues obstructors, the trident severs the three poisons.

original: spros bral gzhu yis thugs rje'i mda' 'phen @88b ma //
analyzed: spros bral gzhu yis thugs rje'i mda' 'phen @88b ma //
translated: The bow of simplicity shoots the arrow of compassion.

original: 'phags lam don ldan ral gcig mal bstod //
analyzed: 'phags lam don ldan ral gcig mal bstod //
translated: I praise the one with the noble path, the meaningful topknot.

original: khro rgyal kun 'dus dbu rgyan rin chen 'chang //
analyzed: khro rgyal kun 'dus dbu rgyan rin chen 'chang //
translated: The crown jewel, the embodiment of all wrathful kings,

original: bdud dgra kun 'joms khro mo'i cha lugs rdzogs //
analyzed: bdud dgra kun 'joms khro mo'i cha lugs rdzogs //
translated: the complete attire of the wrathful one who conquers all enemies of demons,

original: stag lpags sham thabs stobs bcu'i rtsal mnga'a ba'i //
analyzed: stag lpags sham thabs stobs bcu'i rtsal mnga'a ba'i //
translated: the tiger-skin skirt, the one possessing the strength of the ten powers,

original: rgyal ba kun skyed khro rgyal yum la bstod //
analyzed: rgyal ba kun skyed khro rgyal yum la bstod //
translated: I praise the mother of all conquerors, the queen of wrathful kings.

original: skyon bral chu skyes gdung ba sel ba'i steng //
analyzed: skyon bral chu skyes gdung ba sel ba'i steng //
translated: Upon the lotus of the stainless one who removes torment,

original: ta las 'khrungs pa'i phrin las kun rdzogs ma //
analyzed: ta las 'khrungs pa'i phrin las kun rdzogs ma //
translated: the one born from ta, who perfects all activities,üîΩthe one with a face of love, the one with the mudra of increasing activities,

original: brtse ba'i zhal mnga' phrin las rgyas pa'i phyag / ral pa'i cod pan rdo rjes brgyan la bstod //
analyzed: brtse ba'i zhal mnga' phrin las rgyas pa'i phyag / ral pa'i cod pan rdo rjes brgyan la bstod //
translated: I praise the one adorned with a topknot of hair and a vajra.

original: thod dbyug bgegs 'dul padmos 'khor ba skyob //
analyzed: thod dbyug bgegs 'dul padmos 'khor ba skyob //
translated: The skull club subdues obstructors, the lotus protects from samsara,

original: phreng bas sems can rjes 'dzin 'gro drug la //
analyzed: phreng bas sems can rjes 'dzin 'gro drug la //
translated: the rosary cares for sentient beings, the six realms

original: dam chos bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bebs spyi blugs 'dzin //
analyzed: dam chos bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bebs spyi blugs 'dzin //
translated: are rained upon by the stream of nectar of the holy dharma, the one holding the pitcherüîΩ.

original: sgrub pa po la mchog stsol mdzad la bstod //
analyzed: sgrub pa po la mchog stsol mdzad la bstod //
translated: And grant the supreme accomplishment to the practitioner.

original: rin chen rgyan 'chang sa dang yon tan rdzogs //
analyzed: rin chen rgyan 'chang sa dang yon tan rdzogs //
translated: Wearing jeweled ornaments, you perfect the qualities of the earth.

original: dar sham ba tis mi 'jigs lha chen 'dul //
analyzed: dar sham ba tis mi 'jigs lha chen 'dul //
translated: With a silk shawl, you tame the fearless great gods.

original: chags can 'dul phyir chags pa ltar ston pa'i //
analyzed: chags can 'dul phyir chags pa ltar ston pa'i //
translated: To tame the passionate, you display passion.

original: lha mo khro gnyer ldan la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: lha mo khro gnyer ldan la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: To the goddess with a frown, I pay homage and praise.

original: kun kyang ye shes 'od dpung klong na bzhugs //
analyzed: kun kyang ye shes 'od dpung klong na bzhugs //
translated: All of you abide within the expanse of the light of wisdom.

original: thabs la mkhas pas sna tshogs cir yang ston //
analyzed: thabs la mkhas pas sna tshogs cir yang ston //
translated: With skillful means, you manifest in various ways.

original: nyam thag 'gro la kun tu brtse ba can //
analyzed: nyam thag 'gro la kun tu brtse ba can //
translated: You have universal love for suffering beings.

original: thugs rjes rtag tu gzigs mdzad khyod la bstod //
analyzed: thugs rjes rtag tu gzigs mdzad khyod la bstod //
translated: I praise you, who always watch with compassion.

original: ye shes rol pa chen po'i bdag nyid las //
analyzed: ye shes rol pa chen po'i bdag nyid las //
translated: From the nature of the great play of wisdom,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir //
translated: In order to perfect the perfection of generosity,

original: sgeg pa'i tshul 'chang bde ba'i mchod 'bul ma //
analyzed: sgeg pa'i tshul 'chang bde ba'i mchod 'bul ma //
translated: You offer the offering of bliss, assuming a playful manner.

original: sgeg cing bzhad par mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: sgeg cing bzhad par mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise the one who is playful and smiling.

original: byang chub yan lag 'bras bu kun ster bas //
analyzed: byang chub yan lag 'bras bu kun ster bas //
translated: You bestow all the fruits of the branches of enlightenment.

original: tshul khrims pha rol phyir pa rab rdzogs phyir //
analyzed: tshul khrims pha rol phyir pa rab rdzogs phyir //
translated: In order to perfect the perfection of discipline,

original: rin chen phreng ba 'chang zhing mchod pa 'bul //
analyzed: rin chen phreng ba 'chang zhing mchod pa 'bul //
translated: Holding a jeweled garland, you make offerings.

original: chags bral blta bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: chags bral blta bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise you, one who displays freedom from attachment.

original: gzod nas zhi ba'i don la rab mos pas //
analyzed: gzod nas zhi ba'i don la rab mos pas //
translated: With deep interest in the meaning of primordial peace,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir //
translated: You perfectly accomplish the perfection of patience.

original: snyan pa'i glu dbyangs sgrogs shing mchod pa 'bul //
analyzed: snyan pa'i glu dbyangs sgrogs shing mchod pa 'bul //
translated: Singing melodious songs, you make offerings.

original: don dam rtogs par mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: don dam rtogs par mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise you, one who realizes the ultimate truth.

original: rgyal ba mchod par bya phyir skyo ba med //
analyzed: rgyal ba mchod par bya phyir skyo ba med //
translated: Without weariness, you make offerings to the Victorious Ones.

original: brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir //üîΩsna tshogs rol pas dgyes pa'i gar mdzad ma //
analyzed: brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir // sna tshogs rol pas dgyes pa'i gar mdzad ma //
translated: You perfectly accomplish the perfection of diligence.üîΩDancing with various displays, you delight.

original: mnyes pa'i gzigs mo mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: mnyes pa'i gzigs mo mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise you, one who enjoys pleasing spectacles.

original: sangs rgyas rgyu 'bras byang chub sems yin pas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rgyu 'bras byang chub sems yin pas //
translated: Since bodhicitta is the cause and result of buddhahood,

original: bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir //
analyzed: bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir //
translated: You perfectly accomplish the perfection of concentration.

original: yid 'ong me tog rnams kyis mchod mdzad ma //üîΩrnam thar sgo @89a * //
analyzed: yid 'ong me tog rnams kyis mchod mdzad ma // rnam thar sgo @89a * //
translated: Making offerings with beautiful flowers,

original: gsum rtogs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: gsum rtogs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise you, one who realizes the three doors of liberation.

original: thar par 'jug pa dbu mar grub pa dang // shes rab pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir //
analyzed: thar par 'jug pa dbu mar grub pa dang // shes rab pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir //
translated: And you have perfected the transcendent knowledge.

original: bdug spos sprin tshogs rnams kyis rgyal ba mchod//
analyzed: bdug spos sprin tshogs rnams kyis rgyal ba mchod//
translated: You make offerings to the Victorious Ones with clouds of incense.

original: don dam go bar mdzad ma khyod la bstod //
analyzed: don dam go bar mdzad ma khyod la bstod //
translated: You who cause the ultimate to be understood, to you I offer praise.

original: mi shes mun pa lhag mthong gis 'joms shing //
analyzed: mi shes mun pa lhag mthong gis 'joms shing //
translated: You destroy the darkness of ignorance with insight,

original: thabs mchog pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir //
analyzed: thabs mchog pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir //
translated: And you have perfected the transcendent perfection of supreme method.

original: snang ba'i sgron mas kun tu mnyes mdzad ma //
analyzed: snang ba'i sgron mas kun tu mnyes mdzad ma //
translated: You delight everyone with the lamp of illumination.

original: ma rig mun sel mdzad ma khyod la bstod //
analyzed: ma rig mun sel mdzad ma khyod la bstod //
translated: You who clear away the darkness of ignorance, to you I offer praise.üîΩYou completely destroy the foul stench of the afflictions,

original: nyon mongs dri nga rab tu 'joms pa dang // smon lam pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir //üîΩdri mchog byug pas rgyal ba mnyes mdzad ma //
analyzed: nyon mongs dri nga rab tu 'joms pa dang // smon lam pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir // dri mchog byug pas rgyal ba mnyes mdzad ma //
translated: And you have perfected the transcendent perfection of aspiration.üîΩYou make offerings to the Victorious Ones with the finest scented unguents.

original: dri rab bsnams mdzad ma khyod phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: dri rab bsnams mdzad ma khyod phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: You who smell the finest scents, to you I offer praise.

original: snying rje chen pos 'gro ba kun bsdus nas //
analyzed: snying rje chen pos 'gro ba kun bsdus nas //
translated: You gather all beings with your great compassion

original: stobs bcu'i sa la kun tu dgod bya'i phyir //
analyzed: stobs bcu'i sa la kun tu dgod bya'i phyir //
translated: And you establish them in the state of the ten powers.

original: lcags kyu 'dzin cing zhi ba'i las mdzad ma //
analyzed: lcags kyu 'dzin cing zhi ba'i las mdzad ma //
translated: You hold the iron hook and you perform the activity of pacification.

original: shar sgor bzhugs tshul mdzad ma khyod phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: shar sgor bzhugs tshul mdzad ma khyod phyag 'tshal //
translated: You who are seated at the eastern gate, I pay homage to you!

original: byams pa chen pos sdug bsngal kun bsal nas //
analyzed: byams pa chen pos sdug bsngal kun bsal nas //
translated: Through great love, all suffering is dispelled,

original: yang dag rig pa'i don la 'god pa'i phyir //
analyzed: yang dag rig pa'i don la 'god pa'i phyir //
translated: And in order to establish [beings] in the meaning of correct awareness,

original: zhags pa 'dzin cing rgyas pa'i las mdzad ma //
analyzed: zhags pa 'dzin cing rgyas pa'i las mdzad ma //
translated: You hold a noose and perform the activity of increasing.

original: lho sgor bzhugs tshul mdzad ma khyod phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: lho sgor bzhugs tshul mdzad ma khyod phyag 'tshal //
translated: You who are seated at the southern gate, I pay homage to you!

original: dga' ba chen pos 'gro kun bde la 'god //
analyzed: dga' ba chen pos 'gro kun bde la 'god //
translated: Through great joy, all beings are established in bliss,

original: srid gsum 'gro ba dbang du bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: srid gsum 'gro ba dbang du bya ba'i phyir //
translated: And in order to bring the beings of the three existences under control,

original: lcags sgrog bsnams nas dbang gi las mdzad ma //
analyzed: lcags sgrog bsnams nas dbang gi las mdzad ma //
translated: You hold iron shackles and perform the activity of controlling.

original: nub sgor bzhugs tshul mdzad ma khyod phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: nub sgor bzhugs tshul mdzad ma khyod phyag 'tshal //
translated: You who are seated at the western gate, I pay homage to you!

original: btang snyoms chen pos 'gro kun bdag tu mdzad //
analyzed: btang snyoms chen pos 'gro kun bdag tu mdzad //
translated: Through great equanimity, all beings are taken as one's own,

original: ma lus sangs rgyas sa la rab 'god phyir//
analyzed: ma lus sangs rgyas sa la rab 'god phyir//
translated: And in order to fully establish [beings] in the state of buddhahood,

original: dril bu 'chang zhing mngon spyod las mdzad ma //
analyzed: dril bu 'chang zhing mngon spyod las mdzad ma //
translated: You hold a bell and perform the activity of wrath.

original: byang sgong bzhugs ma khyod la gus pas bstod //
analyzed: byang sgong bzhugs ma khyod la gus pas bstod //
translated: You who are seated at the northern gate, I respectfully praise you!

original: tshangs pa drag po nyi ma zla ba dang // dbang po gshin rje chu lha nor gyi bdag / drang srong srin po rlung dang dbang bdag ste //
analyzed: tshangs pa drag po nyi ma zla ba dang // dbang po gshin rje chu lha nor gyi bdag / drang srong srin po rlung dang dbang bdag ste //
translated: the sages, the rƒÅk·π£asas, VƒÅyu, and ≈öiva,

original: 'jig rten 'dul phyir zhabs drung 'dud mdzad bstod//
analyzed: 'jig rten 'dul phyir zhabs drung 'dud mdzad bstod//
translated: bowed at your feet to tame the world.

original: bdag 'dra las kyis mnar ba'i skyo ba yis //
analyzed: bdag 'dra las kyis mnar ba'i skyo ba yis //
translated: I, tormented by karma, am disheartened.

original: yon tan rgya mtsho mnga' ba'i mgon po yi //
analyzed: yon tan rgya mtsho mnga' ba'i mgon po yi //
translated: The protector with an ocean of qualities,

original: yon tan cha shas tsam yang ma rig pas //
analyzed: yon tan cha shas tsam yang ma rig pas //
translated: ignorant of even a fraction of his qualities,

original: khyod kyi mdzad tshul dpag par mi nus mod //
analyzed: khyod kyi mdzad tshul dpag par mi nus mod //
translated: cannot fathom your deeds.

original: mun khung nang nas me khyer 'od tsam gyis //
analyzed: mun khung nang nas me khyer 'od tsam gyis //
translated: But from the darkness, a firefly's light

original: khyod kyi mthu yis dad pa'i blo thob nas //
analyzed: khyod kyi mthu yis dad pa'i blo thob nas //
translated: obtains the mind of faith through your power.

original: rgya mtsho che las skra rtse'i chu thigs tsam //
analyzed: rgya mtsho che las skra rtse'i chu thigs tsam //
translated: From the great ocean, a drop of water on a hair tip

original: bdag yid spro bas khyod la bstod pa 'dis//
analyzed: bdag yid spro bas khyod la bstod pa 'dis//
translated: with this praise of you, my mind is delighted.

original: cung zad tsam rnyed dge ba dri ma med //
analyzed: cung zad tsam rnyed dge ba dri ma med //
translated: A little bit of pure virtue is obtained.

original: gangs ri ltar dkar shas tsam @89b thob pa des //
analyzed: gangs ri ltar dkar shas tsam @89b thob pa des //
translated: Like a fraction of a snow mountain's whiteness,

original: rgyud lnga'i 'gro bas nyes pa kun spangs nas //
analyzed: rgyud lnga'i 'gro bas nyes pa kun spangs nas //
translated: may beings of the five classes abandon all faultsüîΩand attain the state of the Victorious Ones.

original: mgon po 'do dpag med pa'i gnas thob shog /'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha bcu bdun la don rtogs kyi sgo nas bstod pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba rdzogs so//
analyzed: mgon po 'do dpag med pa'i gnas thob shog /'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha bcu bdun la don rtogs kyi sgo nas bstod pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba rdzogs so//
translated: The Stainless Light: A Praise of the Seventeen Deities of the Noble Manjushri's Web of Magical Display, in Terms of Realization, is complete.
